create view adventureworks 
as
SELECT *
 FROM 
 OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://endtoendde.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/AdventureWorks _Sales_2017',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) as q1

create view adventureworks_calender
AS

SELECT *
 FROM 
 OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://endtoendde.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/AdventureWorks_Calendar',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) as q2
